location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 100; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file concerns the British Consulate at Tabriz.The file covers:office expendituregrant of an allowance to the Acting Consulemployment of a clerk-typistcost of living in Tabrizproposal to grant a bonus on salaries of staffoffice allowance grants.The file is composed of correspondence between the Foreign Office, the India Office, the Government of India, the British Consulate at Tabriz, the British Legation at Tehran, and the Treasury.There are some letters in French within the file, copies of letters from the French Consulate at Tabriz, the Turkish Consulate at Tabriz, the Polish Consulate at Tabriz, and the German Consulate at Tabriz.
